document.full_text: a clash is brewing in historic charleston, south carolina, where some residents and preservationists fear a planned new cruise ship terminal will wreck the city's colonial-era charm.
document.title: plan for more cruise ships faces opposition in charleston
lines_and_colors: a clash is brewing in historic charleston, south carolina, where some residents and preservationists fear a planned new cruise ship terminal will wreck the city's colonial-era charm.
